summary: Completed comprehensive testing of password protection implementation for 2026 Accountability Tracker. All password protection features working correctly including backend middleware, frontend auth gate, localStorage persistence, and CORS handling.
passed_tests: Password protection middleware blocks unauthenticated requests
Correct password authentication via x-app-password header
Wrong password returns 401 with proper error message
CORS headers properly configured for 401 responses
Frontend auth gate displays for unauthenticated users
Wrong password shows error message in frontend
Correct password unlocks dashboard and stores in localStorage
Page refresh maintains authentication state via localStorage
Navigation between tabs works after authentication
Clearing localStorage returns to auth gate
All backend API endpoints work with password protection
Integration between frontend and backend authentication
